body_html: Oh, and the original feature request for this has been implemented: tf.contrib.framework.init_from_checkpoint. Closing this, if there issues with exporting / importing models - please open a separate bug.

body: Oh, and the original feature request for this has been implemented: `tf.contrib.framework.init_from_checkpoint`. Closing this, if there issues with exporting / importing models - please open a separate bug.
